summary: STOCKTON STREET is a full-strength, 100-milligram pack of 100 MENTHOL SP. 100mg/ml of  ‘BASIC FULL FLAVOR’ is 2.5g/ mouthful. ‘APPLICATION PERCENT =.:: “Grizzly” (“Crisp, dry, wet, cool, warm, cold, hot, humid, snowy, sunny, windy, rainy, foggy, cloudy, clear, bright, blue, black, red, brown, grey, green, orange, yellow, purple, gray, white, dark, light, shade, color, texture, etc.�
